name: Kia
0:
”Alexa, tell Kia to start my car and set climate control to seventy degrees”
”Alexa, tell Kia to lock my car doors”
”Alexa, tell kia to start my car”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: kia
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Wake up in the morning and get your compatible Kia heated or cooled to just the right temperature as you get ready to head out.
 
Enjoy peace of mind and avoid walking to your Kia to check if it's locked.
 
Start and stop charging your plug-in hybrid or fully electric Kia at your convenience.
 
Do all of the above and more with just the power of your voice by getting the Kia Skill by Kia. The Kia Skill enables your Alexa devices to perform the following remote commands on select Kias:

• Remote Start/Stop Engine
• Remote Climate Control
• Remote Charge Start/Stop
• Remote Horn and Lights
• Remote Lock
• EV/PHEV Charging Status
• EV/PHEV EV Battery Level
• EV/PHEV Estimated Driving Range

 Current vehicles compatible with Alexa:
• Cadenza (MY2020+)
• Carnival - select trims(MY2022+)
• EV6
• Forte - select trims (MY2020+)
• K5 – select trims 
• K900 (MY2016+)
• Niro - select trims (MY2020+)
• Niro EV
• Niro Plug In Hybrid (MY2018+)
• Optima – select trims (MY2019+)
• Optima Hybrid (MY2020+)
• Optima Plug-In Hybrid (MY2017+)
• Rio – select trims (MY2021+)
• Seltos - select trims(MY2021+)
• Sorento - select trims (MY2020+)
• Sorento Hybrid 
• Sorento Plug In Hybrid 
• Soul – select trims (MY2020+)
• Soul EV (MY2017+)
• Sportage – select trims (MY2020+)
• Stinger – select trims (MY2022+)
• Telluride – select trims 

 
This Kia Skill is for the United States only.
 
Easy Set-Up:
• Check that your vehicle is part of the list above and is equipped with a Kia telematics system.
• Search for the Kia Skill in the Alexa app.
• Log in to your Kia account from the Kia Skill. 
• Create a PIN to help manage access to certain features (e.g., Remote Start and Climate Control).
 
Warning: 
• Only use these services/features when safe and legal to do so.
• We recommend using the Kia Skill in a secure and private setting and not in the presence of others, including children. 
• When performing a Remote Start or Climate Control for gas-powered vehicles (includes plug-in hybrids), please make sure your vehicle is parked in a secure and well-ventilated area. Close all doors leading from adjacent living areas to the vehicle area before executing these commands. 
 
Additional Notes: 
• Remote features may vary by model and year.
• The Kia Skill on Alexa will send remote commands to your vehicle, but it does not currently confirm the completion of those commands through your Alexa devices. However, a completion notification will be sent through either the Kia app notification, email, or text depending on the settings in your Kia account.
• An activated Kia account with a current Kia subscription is required to access and use the Kia Skill. 
• To get started with Kia, visit https://owners.kia.com and click "Support", or visit your preferred Kia Dealer.
• For questions or help with Amazon Alexa skill, please contact the Kia Call Center at 844-886-9411.
